conditions.urlValue: =Failed to Upload Transcript to Google Drive

nodes.name: Split Transcript into Blocks
nodes.notes: Divide transcript into chunks for Notion blocks

nodes.name: Convert Blocks to Items
nodes.notes: Convert the chunks into individual items for appending

parameters.query:
SELECT
  input1.toggleID,
  input2.{{ $json.Content }}
FROM
  input2
CROSS JOIN
  input1
